articles.description: Actor Madhavan's son Vedant Madhavan led the 24-member Indian contingent out at Port of Spain for the 2023 Commonwealth Youth Games.
articles.content: Swimmer Vedaant Madhavan, the son of actor R Madhavan, led the 24-member Indian contingent out at the Hasely Crawford Stadium in Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago. The flagbearer of the Indian team … [+2276 chars]
